encounter: Among the dense kelp forests, you discover a shipwrecked chest filled with gold coins. You can't shake the feeling of dread.

With retrieve a stolen map leading to hidden treasure in the hills. On your mind, the sudden appearance of a herd of territorial and aggressive bison accompanied by the distant call of a solitary hawk soaring above becomes a challenging diversion.

A sudden gust brings with it the fresh, clean scent after a rain shower. You spot a tribe of friendly centaurs skilled in herbalism that seem to be nurturing their young and teaching them survival skills.
